title: Lots of room to call your own! Spacious 2 bed! Beautiful neighborhood!
posting_body: ['Come and see what the fuss is all about at Tara Bridge Apartments, located at 1 Magnolia Circle Jonesboro, GA 30236.', 'Description', '........', 'Tara Bridge Apartments boasts Amenities that make living here both comfortable and convenient.', 'Work out in our fitness center, relax by the pool or enjoy a game of tennis on the tennis court.', 'A spacious sunning deck perfect for grilling or picnicking is available.', 'You can also enjoy a leisurely walk around the community as it is nestled amongst canopies of trees and other natural surroundings.', 'Welcome home to the
